bio: Enthusiast since 2016, worked with notable projects such as Vite and Ravencoin. Investments/community management/ building a NFT marketplace and platform
contributionDescription: I have crafted an NFT line up, marketplace and staking platform on Base. The project is a work in progress. The plan is to become a multi-chain project starting first on Base then Optimism and eventually other op stack chains. To fully realize the vison of this project I will use the RetroPGF

contributionLinks.description: op n sky Enchantress test Stake ERC721
op n sky Enchantress test Marketplace
Before the NFT contact Base Zora

impactDescription: I am a small project with less experience than other projects. Im currently still learning and attempting to bring as much value to this space as possible. With that said I believe my contribution is assembling a NFT / staking / marketplace and community built around it. I believe my greatest impact is coming as this project finds greater traction, adoption, a implementation and further deployment.

fundingSources.description: I have not received any funding for any activities

pwFlaggedReason: Flagged for promises of future impact - the applicant claims that their 'greatest impact is coming as this project finds greater traction' which is in violation of rule 1.
